articles.description: The 25-year-old boasted about her makeup skills as she posted a photo of her looking beyond glam on the red carpet to her Instagram Stories on Tuesday.
articles.content:
With her flawless eye shadow, blush, and lip gloss, Zendaya must have hired a professional to have her covered for the night of the Oscars, right?
But as it turns out, the 25-year-old did her own ma… [+1581 chars]
